Tip of the Day
Make sure you equip your items to get their effects, most don't work from inventory alone.

Gem shield
(Eternal)
Quality:
Type: Crafted
Slot: Secondary
Value: 1579
Keywords: Light source
Shield
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A fantastically lightweight shield inlaid with dazzling gems that give off a glowing light.

The Gem shield item is a crafted item.

Requirements

This item has no requirements to use it.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

+0.5% Work efficiency While doing Agility.

+1% Work efficiency While doing Agility.

+1.5% Work efficiency While doing Agility.

+2% Work efficiency While doing Agility.

+2.5% Work efficiency While doing Agility.

+3% Work efficiency While doing Agility.

Uses

This item may be equipped to your character.

Sources
